vlive.korean: 케이. - 임무 그 옥상 갑판에서 일했어요. Kei! - You worked on the deck. 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : 진짜 케빵SHOW🤗
vlive.english: Kei! - You worked on the deck.

examples.korean: The passengers who felt seasick stayed below. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뱃멀미를 하는 승객들은 (갑판) 아래에 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The passengers who felt seasick stayed below. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My cabin is on deck C. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 선실은 갑판 C에 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My cabin is on deck C. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Water washed over the deck. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 물이 갑판 위로 밀려들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Water washed over the deck. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The ship’s crew was sluicing down the deck. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 배의 승무원들이 갑판을 씻어 내리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The ship’s crew was sluicing down the deck. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I was the only person on deck at that time of night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 밤의 그 시간에 갑판에 나와 있는 사람은 나뿐이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was the only person on deck at that time of night. Add to Wordbook
